Content:
# AerialMegaDepth: Learning Aerial-Ground Reconstruction and View Synthesis [Khiem Vuong](https://www.khiemvuong.com/), [Anurag Ghosh](https://anuragxel.github.io/), [Deva Ramanan*](https://www.cs.cmu.edu/~deva), [Srinivasa Narasimhan*](https://www.cs.cmu.edu/~srinivas), [Shubham Tulsiani*](https://shubhtuls.github.io/) **CVPR 2025** [[`arXiv`](https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.13157)] [[`Project Page`](https://aerial-megadepth.github.io/)] [[`3D Web Viewer`](https://aerial-megadepth.github.io/web-viewer/)] [[`Bibtex`](#citation)]
## üì¢ News - (Sep 5, 2025): We have moved the full dataset to HuggingFace to make it easier to download. Please refer to [data_generation](data_generation) for full instructions. ## Table of Contents - [Installation](#installation) - [Quick Start](#quick-start) - [Evaluation](#evaluation) - [Data Generation](#data-generation) - [Acknowledgement](#acknowledgement) - [Citation](#citation) - [Issues](#issues) ## üìã Before You Start... Depending on what you're interested in: - üöÄ **If you want to download pretrained checkpoints and run the demo**: you can continue reading below. - üõ†Ô∏è **If you want to access or generate the dataset yourself**: please refer to [data_generation](data_generation) for full instructions. ## Installation Below are the setup instructions (mostly following [MASt3R repo](https://github.com/naver/mast3r)). We follow the MASt3R setup since it encapsulates DUSt3R, but both should work similarly.
Translation:
# AerialMegaDepth : Apprentissage de la Reconstruction A√©rienne-Terrestre et de la Synth√®se de Vue [Khiem Vuong](https://www.khiemvuong.com/), [Anurag Ghosh](https://anuragxel.github.io/), [Deva Ramanan*](https://www.cs.cmu.edu/~deva), [Srinivasa Narasimhan*](https://www.cs.cmu.edu/~srinivas), [Shubham Tulsiani*](https://shubhtuls.github.io/) **CVPR 2025** [[`arXiv`](https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.13157)] [[`Page du Projet`](https://aerial-megadepth.github.io/)] [[`Visionneuse 3D Web`](https://aerial-megadepth.github.io/web-viewer/)] [[`Bibtex`](#citation)]
## üì¢ Actualit√©s - (5 sept. 2025) : Nous avons d√©plac√© l'ensemble complet de donn√©es sur HuggingFace pour faciliter le t√©l√©chargement. Veuillez vous r√©f√©rer √† [data_generation](data_generation) pour les instructions compl√®tes. ## Table des Mati√®res - [Installation](#installation) - [D√©marrage Rapide](#quick-start) - [√âvaluation](#evaluation) - [G√©n√©ration de Donn√©es](#data-generation) - [Remerciements](#acknowledgement) - [Citation](#citation) - [Probl√®mes](#issues) ## üìã Avant de Commencer... Selon ce qui vous int√©resse : - üöÄ **Si vous voulez t√©l√©charger des points de contr√¥le pr√©-entra√Æn√©s et ex√©cuter la d√©mo** : vous pouvez continuer √† lire ci-dessous. - üõ†Ô∏è **Si vous souhaitez acc√©der ou g√©n√©rer vous-m√™me le jeu de donn√©es** : veuillez vous r√©f√©rer √† [data_generation](data_generation) pour les instructions compl√®tes. ## Installation Voici les instructions d'installation (suivant principalement le d√©p√¥t [MASt3R](https://github.com/naver/mast3r)). Nous suivons la configuration MASt3R car elle encapsule DUSt3R, mais les deux devraient fonctionner de mani√®re similaire.

RowTranslations.originContent: Below are the setup instructions (mostly following [MASt3R repo](https://github.com/naver/mast3r)). We follow the MASt3R setup since it encapsulates DUSt3R, but both should work similarly.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Voici les instructions d'installation (suivant principalement le d√©p√¥t [MASt3R](https://github.com/naver/mast3r)). Nous suivons la configuration MASt3R car elle encapsule DUSt3R, mais les deux devraient fonctionner de mani√®re similaire.

Content:
```bash
git clone --recursive https://github.com/kvuong2711/aerial-megadepth.git
cd aerial-megadepth/mast3r

# If you already cloned the repository, you can update the submodules:
# git submodule update --init --recursive
```
Translation:
```bash
git clone --recursive https://github.com/kvuong2711/aerial-megadepth.git
cd aerial-megadepth/mast3r

# If you already cloned the repository, you can update the submodules:
# git submodule update --init --recursive
```

RowTranslations.originContent: # If you already cloned the repository, you can update the submodules:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: # If you already cloned the repository, you can update the submodules:

Translation: 2. Cr√©er l'environnement et installer les d√©pendances :

RowTranslations.translatedContent: 2. Cr√©er l'environnement et installer les d√©pendances :

Content:
```bash
conda create -n aerialmd python=3.11 cmake=3.14.0
conda activate aerialmd 
conda install pytorch torchvision pytorch-cuda=12.1 -c pytorch -c nvidia  # use the correct version of cuda for your system
pip install -r requirements.txt
pip install -r dust3r/requirements.txt
pip install -r dust3r/requirements_optional.txt
```
Translation:
```bash
conda create -n aerialmd python=3.11 cmake=3.14.0
conda activate aerialmd 
conda install pytorch torchvision pytorch-cuda=12.1 -c pytorch -c nvidia  # use the correct version of cuda for your system
pip install -r requirements.txt
pip install -r dust3r/requirements.txt
pip install -r dust3r/requirements_optional.txt
```

RowTranslations.originContent: conda install pytorch torchvision pytorch-cuda=12.1 -c pytorch -c nvidia  # use the correct version of cuda for your system
RowTranslations.translatedContent: conda install pytorch torchvision pytorch-cuda=12.1 -c pytorch -c nvidia  # use the correct version of cuda for your system

Content: 3. Optional, compile the cuda kernels for RoPE (as in CroCo v2):
Translation: 3. Optionnel, compiler les noyaux cuda pour RoPE (comme dans CroCo v2) :

RowTranslations.originContent: 3. Optional, compile the cuda kernels for RoPE (as in CroCo v2):
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 3. Optionnel, compiler les noyaux cuda pour RoPE (comme dans CroCo v2) :

Content:
```bash
# DUST3R relies on RoPE positional embeddings for which you can compile some cuda kernels for faster runtime.
cd dust3r/croco/models/curope/
python setup.py build_ext --inplace
cd ../../../../
```
Translation:
```bash
# DUST3R relies on RoPE positional embeddings for which you can compile some cuda kernels for faster runtime.
cd dust3r/croco/models/curope/
python setup.py build_ext --inplace
cd ../../../../
```

RowTranslations.originContent: # DUST3R relies on RoPE positional embeddings for which you can compile some cuda kernels for faster runtime.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: # DUST3R relies on RoPE positional embeddings for which you can compile some cuda kernels for faster runtime.

Content:
## Quick Start
Our finetuned checkpoints are fully compatible with the original DUSt3R/MASt3R/MASt3R-SfM codebase - if you already have them set up, you can simply swap the checkpoint for aerial-ground scenarios!

### Checkpoints

There are two options for downloading DUSt3R and MASt3R checkpoint finetuned on our AerialMegaDepth dataset:

1. You can use our huggingface_hub integration: the models ([aerial-dust3r](https://huggingface.co/kvuong2711/checkpoint-aerial-dust3r) or [aerial-mast3r](https://huggingface.co/kvuong2711/checkpoint-aerial-mast3r)) will be downloaded automatically.

2. Or, download the checkpoints manually (using [gdown](https://github.com/wkentaro/gdown), install using `pip install gdown`):
Translation:
## D√©marrage rapide
Nos points de contr√¥le affin√©s sont enti√®rement compatibles avec la base de code originale DUSt3R/MASt3R/MASt3R-SfM - si vous les avez d√©j√† configur√©s, vous pouvez simplement √©changer le point de contr√¥le pour les sc√©narios a√©rien-sol !

### Points de contr√¥le

Il existe deux options pour t√©l√©charger les points de contr√¥le DUSt3R et MASt3R affin√©s sur notre jeu de donn√©es AerialMegaDepth :

1. Vous pouvez utiliser notre int√©gration huggingface_hub : les mod√®les ([aerial-dust3r](https://huggingface.co/kvuong2711/checkpoint-aerial-dust3r) ou [aerial-mast3r](https://huggingface.co/kvuong2711/checkpoint-aerial-mast3r)) seront t√©l√©charg√©s automatiquement.

2. Ou, t√©l√©chargez les points de contr√¥le manuellement (en utilisant [gdown](https://github.com/wkentaro/gdown), installez avec `pip install gdown`) :

RowTranslations.translatedContent: Nos points de contr√¥le affin√©s sont enti√®rement compatibles avec la base de code originale DUSt3R/MASt3R/MASt3R-SfM - si vous les avez d√©j√† configur√©s, vous pouvez simplement √©changer le point de contr√¥le pour les sc√©narios a√©rien-sol !

RowTranslations.originContent: 1. You can use our huggingface_hub integration: the models ([aerial-dust3r](https://huggingface.co/kvuong2711/checkpoint-aerial-dust3r) or [aerial-mast3r](https://huggingface.co/kvuong2711/checkpoint-aerial-mast3r)) will be downloaded automatically.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 1. Vous pouvez utiliser notre int√©gration huggingface_hub : les mod√®les ([aerial-dust3r](https://huggingface.co/kvuong2711/checkpoint-aerial-dust3r) ou [aerial-mast3r](https://huggingface.co/kvuong2711/checkpoint-aerial-mast3r)) seront t√©l√©charg√©s automatiquement.

RowTranslations.originContent: 2. Or, download the checkpoints manually (using [gdown](https://github.com/wkentaro/gdown), install using `pip install gdown`):
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 2. Ou, t√©l√©chargez les points de contr√¥le manuellement (en utilisant [gdown](https://github.com/wkentaro/gdown), installez avec `pip install gdown`) :

Content:
```bash
# you are inside aerial-megadepth/mast3r
mkdir -p checkpoints/
gdown --fuzzy "https://drive.google.com/open?id=1wSGpYwWeGn99J8dVWNkfefwmWMAH7LFT" -O checkpoints/  # checkpoint-aerial-dust3r.pth
gdown --fuzzy "https://drive.google.com/open?id=1LrRNUQRQZcVzcioyYHYYx9ImypSZpUq2" -O checkpoints/  # checkpoint-aerial-mast3r.pth
```
Translation:
```bash
# you are inside aerial-megadepth/mast3r
mkdir -p checkpoints/
gdown --fuzzy "https://drive.google.com/open?id=1wSGpYwWeGn99J8dVWNkfefwmWMAH7LFT" -O checkpoints/  # checkpoint-aerial-dust3r.pth
gdown --fuzzy "https://drive.google.com/open?id=1LrRNUQRQZcVzcioyYHYYx9ImypSZpUq2" -O checkpoints/  # checkpoint-aerial-mast3r.pth
```

Content:
### Inference/Demo
We provide a few example images in the [assets](assets) folder for quick testing, including images from [ULTRRA challenge](https://sites.google.com/view/ultrra-wacv-2025) and [Accenture-NVS1](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2503.18711).

Each script (e.g., [demo_dust3r_nongradio.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kvuong2711/aerial-megadepth/main/mast3r/demo_dust3r_nongradio.py)) contains predefined image paths to demonstrate typical use cases. You can modify the `image_list` variable inside the script to try different pairs. You can run inference using the following commands:

- DUSt3R demo code:
Translation:
### Inf√©rence/D√©mo
Nous fournissons quelques images d'exemple dans le dossier [assets](assets) pour des tests rapides, y compris des images du [challenge ULTRRA](https://sites.google.com/view/ultrra-wacv-2025) et [Accenture-NVS1](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2503.18711).

Chaque script (par exemple, [demo_dust3r_nongradio.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kvuong2711/aerial-megadepth/main/mast3r/demo_dust3r_nongradio.py)) contient des chemins d'images pr√©d√©finis pour d√©montrer des cas d'utilisation typiques. Vous pouvez modifier la variable `image_list` √† l'int√©rieur du script pour essayer diff√©rentes paires. Vous pouvez ex√©cuter l'inf√©rence en utilisant les commandes suivantes :

- Code d√©mo DUSt3R :

You can modify the `image_list` variable inside the script to try different pairs. You can run inference using the following commands:

Vous pouvez modifier la variable `image_list` √† l'int√©rieur du script pour essayer diff√©rentes paires. Vous pouvez ex√©cuter l'inf√©rence en utilisant les commandes suivantes :

Content:
```bash
python demo_dust3r_nongradio.py --weights kvuong2711/checkpoint-aerial-dust3r

# or, if you downloaded the checkpoints manually:
# python demo_dust3r_nongradio.py --weights checkpoints/checkpoint-aerial-dust3r.pth
```

Content:
This script (adapted from [PoseDiffusion](https://github.com/facebookresearch/PoseDiffusion)) reports RRA and RTA at various degree thresholds.

## Data Generation
For instructions on how to download and/or generate the data, please refer to [data_generation](data_generation).

## Acknowledgement
This codebase builds upon many excellent open-source projects, such as [MegaDepth](https://www.cs.cornell.edu/projects/megadepth), [DUSt3R](https://github.com/naver/dust3r), [hloc](https://github.com/cvg/Hierarchical-Localization), [COLMAP](https://github.com/colmap/colmap), etc. We thank the respective authors for making their work publicly available.

## Citation
If you find our work to be useful in your research, please consider citing our paper:
Translation:
Ce script (adapt√© de [PoseDiffusion](https://github.com/facebookresearch/PoseDiffusion)) rapporte RRA et RTA √† diff√©rents seuils en degr√©s.

## G√©n√©ration des donn√©es
Pour des instructions sur la mani√®re de t√©l√©charger et/ou de g√©n√©rer les donn√©es, veuillez vous r√©f√©rer √† [data_generation](data_generation).

## Remerciements
Cette base de code s‚Äôappuie sur de nombreux excellents projets open-source, tels que [MegaDepth](https://www.cs.cornell.edu/projects/megadepth), [DUSt3R](https://github.com/naver/dust3r), [hloc](https://github.com/cvg/Hierarchical-Localization), [COLMAP](https://github.com/colmap/colmap), etc. Nous remercions les auteurs respectifs pour avoir rendu leur travail public.

## Citation
Si vous trouvez notre travail utile pour votre recherche, veuillez envisager de citer notre article :

Content:
## Issues
If you have any problem/question/suggestion, feel free to create an issue or reach out directly to me via [email](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kvuong2711/aerial-megadepth/main/mailto:kvuong@andrew.cmu.edu).
Translation:
## Probl√®mes
Si vous avez un probl√®me/question/suggestion, n'h√©sitez pas √† cr√©er un ticket ou √† me contacter directement par [email](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kvuong2711/aerial-megadepth/main/mailto:kvuong@andrew.cmu.edu).
